Text:
Hello Auntie Melissa and Uncle Stephen!  

Hope all is going well on the east coast! 

We are slowly getting settled in Venice.  It’s awesome!  Just such a great vibe!   We can’t wait for you to visit! 

We booked a tiny get away Oct 3-6 for my bday / babymoon.  In Mexico.   

Would you guys still like to come out for the week?  

We could all hang for a few days, you can join Nevan surfing or come match tasting with me!, and then you can take over our house - mi casa es su casa as they say here!  - and enjoy Venice with Bash!  

Ps Bash will teach you Spanish… he already says “agua” over and over!  Everything is agua!  

We have a nanny who can do a lot of the heavy lifting with Bash during the days and up to bedtime so it’s a lot of fun.  And we have a baby sitter for evenings if needed.  

It would be awesome to have you out here and I would be forever thankful for a few days away..  otherwise we can bring Bash on our romantic getaway but I’m not sure he’ll like it 😂

Pls let us know how you’re feeling about this idea!  

Miss you + love you! ❤️❤️
Oh wow what an offer and thanks for thinking of us. Let us talk after work today and get back to you ASAP.
Sounds good!
Wow it’s beautiful there
We spruced up the tree house with a gong and an aerial yoga swing (which Nevan vetoed and is now a hammock)
Wow this place is incredible!! Would love to visit!

Hey! We can come out in October!
Hi! Yes! October 2 good?
Or 1st?
Will look at flights and schedule for which day is best
Wahoo can’t wait to see you guys and hang with little Bash!!!
Ok great!!  We leave on the 3rd so come any day before that! So excited! 💕💕
Loved “Ok great!!  We leave on the 3rd so come any day before that! So excited! 💕💕”
Thank you for these amazing videos. We watched them multiple times. Aaron Morris is here for the weekend and says hi as well.

Yes love these videos and messages!! So special for our special guy 💓💓💓
Loved an image
Love this! Great photo!
